overview:
Nanette serves as a Director at Think First responsible for engagement leadership, client management, project management, and staff training and development.

Prior to joining Think First, Nanette was the Corporate Director of Revenue Cycle and Patient Access at West Penn Allegheny Health System where she was responsible for managing and coordinating activities pertaining to patient access, patient accounting programs, financial screening, patient flow, and other related activities. Previous to West Penn Allegheny Health System, Nanette was the Corporate Director of Patient Access/Financial Clearance Center at Saint Barnabas Health Care System, responsible for patient access processes enterprise wide.
